wersja alternatywna, zamiast znacznika '|' dodaję null:
419171104null419171003C2null419171032C2null419171104null419171003C2null419171032C2
419170200null419170200null419170001C1null419170200null419170200null419170001C1
419380400null02Y0039nullnull419380400null02Y0039
419540000null419380400nullnull419540000null419380400
419170100null419380200nullnull419170100null419380200
null419540000nullnullnull419540000
null419380300nullnullnull419380300
null419380100nullnullnull419380100
null419170100nullnullnull419170100

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
int pointers = 2;
int index;
int incomeStringLength;
cases:
1. index ≠ 0 pointer= 1 => add to the end :"|null"
2. index ≠ 0 pointer= 2 => insert between index and index+1 : "null"
3. index=0 , pointer=1 => add :"null|". And at the end :"|null"
4. index=0 , pointer=2 => add the begin od the row: "null|null|"

@testString
|419170100|419540000|||419540000||419170100
